messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] wimping out
messages.msgSnippet: NOOOOO Bob.. don t stop posting.. please.. we like you here.. i may think you are a bit narrow minded.. but a lot of people think I M a total lunatic.. and i
messages.messageBody:
NOOOOO Bob.. don't stop posting..
please.. we like you here..
i may think you are a bit narrow minded.. but a lot of people think I'M a total lunatic.. and i keep posting..

i mean when you get a bunch of intelligent strong people together there is going to be strong dialogue.. personally i enjoy it.. most lists are way wimpier than this one..

and by the way.. who said god was a HE? i think it was some midieval monk holding onto his job, myself..

L

messages.subject: wimping out
messages.msgSnippet: Well, folks, this list is not what I thought it would be. I needed a forum to receive support and ideas on how to keep on doing what we are doing. I could
messages.messageBody:
Well, folks, this list is not what I thought it would be. I needed a forum
to receive support and ideas on how to keep on doing what we are doing. I
could bring up my questions, but really, with all the talk of religions,
heaven, and hell - <shrug> I understand lists go through periods of off
topics, however, this is too much for me to have to wade through to get the
one or two pieces of mail that would be helpful to me.

Going now to unsub.

Peace
Tanya
